website_summaries.verdict: A top name in locks for almost a century, Schlage successfully combines trusted security and the latest smart technology with this top-quality model.
pros: Intuitive – uses Z-Wave technology that works with numerous devices including Alexa
Has a built-in alarm and 3 alert modes
Installation is as straightforward as traditional locks, and customer service is helpful when questions arise
cons: If your doors are larger than standard size, you may need additional hardware

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a busy front door!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and we got the Wink wireless setup too. I was worried it may compromise our house by not keeping with manual locks but this has been soooo nice. You can program a code for each kid and see when they use it from your phone. You can check and lock the door behind them. Great for letting guests in before you get home. And you can set temporary codes for guests as not to let key copies Rome around. It's also nice that there is no waiting around for the key holder to let the family in when you all pile out of the car. After months of use we are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Play Music

customer_reviews.title: I hope I read the comments before I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: I hope I read the comments before I bought it. It worked very well at the very beginning. But it run out of battery after one month. And the battery runs shorter and shorter. Now I need to change the battery every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality lock but instruction was bad
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the lock today. Let just say that the instruction was not clear. I was disappointed with that. It shipped with the booklets as well as the large folded instruction guide but it was for another model. Once I found out the actual instruction was in the booklet, I followed it. Viewed online video too but the thing they tripped me was the installation of the deadbolt and whether it has to be turned up top. Wasted 1 hrs on this. So far the keyless entry is working smoothly. Will update after using for several month or years. The lock itself deserves 5 stars but the instruction and experience makes it low.
customer_reviews.author: Duc T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. You do need a compatible hub to use with it though. It's worth it. Once you have the hub you can set pass codes for different people, have it alert you when a code is used, alert you when the door is unlocked (via key or code) and lock the door automatically after a set amount of time (you pick the time). I like that we can give codes instead of keys and that we can delete the codes when they are no longer needed. It's added safety and piece of mind. Plus, it freaking slick looking. I mean, come on, it's pretty sweet!
customer_reviews.author: OmNomZombie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking door handle set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy installation. Fit and finish is superb. Wish Schlage would provide better instructions on its smart feature integration. When you go to their site and look up this set up it says Google Home integration but I was unable to figure out how natively. I was able to add it to SmartThings and create a virtual switch which in turn was able to be controlled in the Google Home. Other then that one issue it is working as described.
customer_reviews.author: K5_Kud

customer_reviews.title: Great door lock
customer_reviews.text: I love this at the house. It’s so easy for teens to come home and so handy since they’re prone to lose or forget their keys. The only thing I disagree with the manufacturer in the description of the product concerns the statements about the keypad not leaving fingerprints on the numbers. The keypad is a matte finger resistant material but in the evening at a certain angle I have seen the numbers of our code having signs of repeated use. So I just wipe it down every now and then. Otherwise it would have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart lock, but I have a handful of other smart products. I bought this on sale a few months back, but hadn't gotten around to installing it until recently when I replaced my front door. Install was easy, if your door is prebored from the factory, you will just need to drill an additional 3/8" hole for the bottom of the handle. A pattern with dimensions is provided for this, and the design provides you a fair amount of flexibility. The lock works great, and easily paired with my SmartThings hub. The touch screen works well, and doesn't look out of place.
customer_reviews.author: LED Fan

customer_reviews.title: Ring compatible!  Easy setup to allow Ring alarm to lock and unlock
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation to replace my existing Schlage (non digital) deadbolt and handle set. Happy that this also works directly with my Ring alarm system so I can remotely lock and unlock doors.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Best decision to start my smart home.
customer_reviews.text: Going keyless is the best thing. Love the look, love the feel and love the color of this set. My family really likes it and some even want to start going keyless in their own house. The batteries that came with the lock died real quick, within 3 weeks. Put in some Amazon branded batteries in it, it's been 1 month and no sign of drain til last week, down to 99%. I use the lock with the Wink 2 and really like how everything can be done from within the app, no need to be changing locks or alarms manually from the lock.
customer_reviews.author: techwiz83

customer_reviews.title: So perfect. Looks so classy and modern at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my apartment. Some drilling need to be done but i was able to do it and I’m no handy man. Just follow instructions and have the right tools. Battery last a lot. Touch screen is super reliable as so is its locking features. Its a great lock. No more keys needed. Perfect when going out for a run or for a bike. No need to carry stuff that you might regret if you lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Yabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool new technology deadbolt. I had a local locksmith install it and it went really good, then was walked through how to set up passwords. Overall easy to use, looks good, and we are very happy with this new deadbolt. Only thing is for one of our older doors, our house was built in 1915, this won't work with it, for modern doors only. Just a heads up for anybody thinking about buying this for an older door, you will need to replace it with a newer door then install locks.
customer_reviews.author: InfamousS

customer_reviews.title: High quality and beautiful, so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good on my door and was very easy to install. The lock has a really cool app with videos that make it easy to install. The handle and lock operate smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kallos

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and install, works well with Alexa via the wink bridge, I can unlock and lock my door(s) via voice command (unlock will require a voice code) and you can easily give your friends/family access to your door via the app or just give them the door combo, the app can be configured so permissions to your home expire on certain dates, which can be useful for contractors doing work in your home or renters who's lease has expired etc.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! High quality lock and door handle. I'm very happy I have a left handed front door as its much less than a right handed lock. beautiful color too
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laffey

customer_reviews.title: Great lock set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lock set we have had one of these on our back door for a couple of years and it works great. We installed a Kevo on our front door and have had nothing but problems with it. The main thing with the Kevo is it’s sometimes won’t connect so we get to stand there irritated trying to get in our house. So we ordered another one of these sets for our front door. We haven’t had any problems with the key pad it works every time. Oh and this lock set is cheaper here on Amazon than Lowe’s or Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get this product, but it stopped working after 4 days. Changed batteries and nothing. I thought I did all my research but after receiving it we thought it had an app it worked with to lock/unlock. It does not. It works with Alexa and home security. We have Google Home. We are returning this and going to try the wifi schlage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Works with Alexa, as long as you have a smart hub
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I really like the fact Alexa can lock the door and confirm with me the door is locked. I did not realize in order for it to do this I needed to buy the Samsung Smart Things hub, I made the assumption it would do this all by itself. A call to Schlage customer service (I'll give customer service 1 star, except the I.T. guys, they were great, but an hour to get to a live person to transfer me to I.T. was RIDICULOUS!) and they told me what I needed to make it work. Been happy with it since.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 5150ish

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of this product. Unexpectedly life changing in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love having the touchscreen lock. This lock makes coming and going much easier, especially if I'm juggling a baby, packages and all the other things that need to be carried in and out of the house. I also love that I can lock and unlock this from my phone, so I don't even need to have my keys out when I come in and out of the house. The only thing I wish I could change about this is that I wish I could set up the codes from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Parent

customer_reviews.title: The physical installation was quick and easy, some adjustment will be required in most cases ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this lock in February, 2017 and connected to my Wink2 hub. The physical installation was quick and easy, some adjustment will be required in most cases to get correct alignment. Linking with Wink2 hub was also quite easy. The lock-set looks great and very well manufactured. I initially had an issue with the batteries only lasting 3 week, after talking with Schlage and Wink and disconnecting from Wink i was able to determine this was a Wink issue. Recently I received a notification from Wink that they had corrected the issues. I have since reconnected to the Wink2 hub and now all are working together seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my vacation rental property!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my vacation rental property. Easy to install. I bought the wink hub 2. Had to call Schlage customer support with a question on connecting and they helped me right away. I've installed 3 more of these on other properties. When someone rents the property, I simply go to the wink app on my phone and put a code in for them. When they leave, I delete the code. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: great product, great manufacturer warranty
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly like we needed, until it stopped working, but Schlage replaced it free. Gotta say we are happy with the product and the manufacturer. Even though it stopped working after 14 months, when we called the company, they stood by their product and sent us a new one. We love the convenience for us and our guests.
customer_reviews.author: KathMcP

customer_reviews.title: Still getting used to the new technology
customer_reviews.text: Love this great quality electronic door lock system. It was a bit tricky to install. Note, if you don't close the door quickly, that deadbolt comes out while the door is still open and it will nick the door frame when you close the door.
customer_reviews.author: Smp

customer_reviews.title: Follow Directions
customer_reviews.text: Works great but if you want to use all the features you need to subscribe to Nexia and have a Nexia Bridge or Echo.The Nexia Bridge is the hub of your system and lets you manage your home through your online Nexia account and mobile apps. The Nexia Bridge connects to your router to allow you to control your home through a securely encrypted broadband Internet connection. Be careful and follow all the install directions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Mysterious code resets and mediocre battery life
customer_reviews.text: After over 1 year of use, I have reduced my ratings of this product to 3 stars. Battery life is not that great - typically we the batteries have to be replaced every 2 months. However, even more serious is the fact that I've had several instances where the security code erased/reset itself which required me to reprogram it - even when the batteries were relatively fresh. August 2018 update: After three years of use, I have reduced it to 2 stars. The battery connector broke - probably due to the batteries having to be replaced so often.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily a quick switch out the locks...
customer_reviews.text: The new lock did not align up with the holes in the door from the old lock so, this was not an easy switch out, it was a complete new install. It required drilling new holes using the provided template and then the old hole needed to be filled, sanded and repainted. Otherwise, the lock works great and looks great. You should also be aware that the lower handle does not provide a locking mechanism so this is a deadbolt lock only.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this! I've been researching electronic door locks for ...
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! I've been researching electronic door locks for months and we decided on this one. We have three small children and the school bus drops them off right in front of the house, so we wanted a keypad rather than a key, since they are pros at losing things. My husband was able to set it up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, installation was quick and relatively painless. Programming was a breeze. I have it set up as my front door lock on my rental property to minimize rekeying. Would absolutely recommend, very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Easy to use for us tech disabled ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to use for us tech disabled folks. Had trouble getting message to vendor, but once it got through they responded immediately. There were two aesthetic parts not in the box (deadbolt strike plate and end cap). The parts from our old door work just fine, but doesn't match so we'd like to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Schlage Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We have been really happy with our purchase of this set. It has worked great for almost two years, but the keypad suddenly started acting up, only activating about once a week, being completely dead the rest of the time. After calling Schlage, they took my details, opened a ticket, and are shipping me a replacement unit which will be here in the next 2-3 weeks. With electronics exposed to the elements, you can't guarantee that it will work forever, but was really impressed with their customer service in this instance.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Miller

customer_reviews.title: easy, secure, durable
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever changing a lock so I was nervous that this system might be too challenging to put together. I am pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to put together! It would look amazing against any light colored door. The ansi 1 rating was what drew me in. There alarm system is ready to set up and the touch pad is easy to program. It's very durable. I'm highly recommending this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with the finish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to use on both front and back entry doors to my home. Both entryways are covered with direct sunlight only for a couple hours per day, and I am not near any body of water. While I have no complaints at all with the technical capabilities, I am disappointed with the finish. Both sets began to corrode within the first year and now appear much older than their approximately 19 months of service would suggest. I still give them 4 stars because they function very well. I just wish that the finish were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Marcantel

customer_reviews.title: The finish rubbed off
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when cleaning my wife sprayed with alcohol due to COVID-19 it took off the bronze color. Looks terrible now..
customer_reviews.author: Shane Harris

customer_reviews.title: The best keypad door lock with a deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: If you're willing to spend the money this keypad door lock with a deadbolt is probably the best doorlock ever. Push a button when you leave and the door locks itself. Upon returning, press the Schlage button on the keypad and type in your code and the door unlocks itself! No keys to carry or forget. No fighting with kids to remember to lock the door with the key. And still the safety and security of a deadbolt. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Gopher Gal

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is we love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We use digital entry for all of our outside doors and even on the rentals we own. My husband purchased this one to update the look of our front door. It installed easily and after a few attempts it paired right up to our security system.
customer_reviews.author: Islandstyles

customer_reviews.title: In the words of a Locksmith
customer_reviews.text: To start I have to say as a locksmith this lock was easy to install and program, it works flawlessly and is exactly what my situation called for, it covered all my old holes perfectly, Schlage has always been top of the line in my book.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: works great. we can give our dog sitter a temp ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. we can give our dog sitter a temp code and I do not have to worry about a house key any more. Also the auto lock feature is very nice. I do not have to worry about the door being left unlocked. I also have this paired so i can lock and unlock remotely.
customer_reviews.author: seal

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The dead bolt will lock under power but the gears grind and the door will not unlock. The locking mechanism was professionally installed with a new door purchase. I will update my review if I am able to resolve issue with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works with Ring Alarm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and work very well. Install for 2 months now and it's been great. I had a single door handle before so i had to drill into the door to mount and make minor modifications to the door frame for a perfect fit. Well worth the investment, perfect for renters/air bnb.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weyant

customer_reviews.title: Batteries Change often
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product, Schlage Z-Wave Connect Camelot Touchscreen Deadbolt, for about six months now and must change the four AA batteries just about every month. That is not terrible just a pain. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This lock has been flawless for us. I can unlock it remotely using our Wink and the battery life is not bad either. Installed a year ago, I just received a message from wink that the batteries are low. Looks great, works great, easy install....no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if my handyman installed this wrong or if it’s the actually product but it’s really finicky. We have to put our code in twice sometimes for it to fully lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart lock!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this with Alexa and SmartThings. It was easy for me to install and it’s very high tech and high quality! If you need a smart lock, but don’t want Bluetooth, this is a great option! I love using the SmartThings app to unlock and lock the door, so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great for our front door. It is easy to use and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaDoolittle

customer_reviews.title: So easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews that this unit had some problems, especially with battery life. I have had no problems with this unit. In fact, I put this on my door well over a year ago. It went smoothly, easy to set up codes, and I still have the same batteries that I started with over a year ago. I think by locking it manually when I walk in, instead of letting it automatically lock, is helping the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It was a little more than I wanted to pay for a door handle, but it is SO worth it! Not having to fumble around for keys it great. It is also nice to be able to lock your door when you are outside working and not have to worry about keys...just punch in the code. I do not like to leave my door unlocked or my garage door open while I am outside because I had an intruder enter my house once when I was distracted...and this helps solve that problem without a lot of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LindaMDee

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks, I couldn’t wait to buy it and install it no matter what my wife said! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Juan.C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock. Installed by my husband with basically no trouble. Fit right into the space from the old lock. Looks amazing. It is so convenient not to have to worry about having a key, if whoever isn't home can get it, or if the door gets locked behind people coming and going. We have 8 people programmed and no one has had any trouble. And the door locks behind you so you never have to worry. I highly recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The batteries last about 4-6 weeks. I can’t find who to contact to get this taken care of for warranty. You need a key with you at all times because you never know when they will die. Installation is easy but who cares if it does not work right!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a year
customer_reviews.text: The lock worked great for about a year. Batteries don't last more than a couple weeks at best now for a door that is used a few times a day. Looks like I'll see what Schlage customer service can do.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Looks grew was easy to install but be aware that the long screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks grew was easy to install but be aware that the long screws for the dead bolt are too long if you have side lights. We broke one when the screw hit it. Luckily we were able to order a new one from the manufacturer. Also the manual that come with it is not very good as far as programming it but if you go online you can find better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: CLN

customer_reviews.title: still works and looks like the first day
customer_reviews.text: Two years since I purchased this set, still works and looks like the first day. Very happy with the product and highly recommend. The seller, Plumber Surplus, one of the best sellers I've dealt with. Early on had an issue with the order and Plumber Surplus came through and settled this to my full satisfaction. Great product, great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Captn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and program
customer_reviews.text: The set was very easy to and program. We really like the features and the look. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It look very attractive on my front door. The cons...the alarm keeps going off. Sometimes the code doesn't unlock the door You hear it makes the sound but door is still close.i am happy it came with a key. I might have gotten a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Jones26

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, especially if you don't want to hand out keys to contractors.
customer_reviews.text: During our home renovation, this was a real security feature. We were able to give subcontractors access without giving them keys. It is also a real beauty.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great set, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set, especially for the price. Connects to SmartThings hub which is really handy as well. Can remotely unlock door while away. Looks nice, easy to program and have replaced the 9V battery once in a year. Wish it had the ability to set passcodes that were only accessible during certain times but does not seem to work or connectivity to remotely add temp passwords, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock, form and function; Awesome technology!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Works flawlessly! This lock is stunning. The lock was a breeze to install (~20 minutes). It integrated very easily into remote functioning in my Wink application through my Wink Hub. If I were to say one negative, it would be that the locking motor is a bit loud. However, I don't care considering how awesome everything else is; a worthy trade-off. This lock is so great, I ordered one for my parents as well! Great job Schlage, From a New Loyal Customer...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Easy to use. My husband installed it and made the comment the instructions made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Schlage support does not respond
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite expensive lock in April. It stopped working in January. On January 28 I sent all requested support and warranty information to Schlage support. Got a robot reply asking me for exactly the same information. Jan 29, Jan 30, Jan 31, Feb 1 passed - no response from Schlage support.
customer_reviews.author: bladed mind

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, but we can’t get it hooked up to our phones. A least if someone forgets to lock the door it will lock after 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: JANET SHAFER

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade to Your Home Security
customer_reviews.text: It's working great! Our son installed it. He had a problem with entering our codes. After a 30 min hold time with customer service, the agent was very patient and knowledgeable, resolving the problem in 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Needs wink hub to connect to alexa
customer_reviews.text: With my wink hub and alexa I can lock the door, but there is no unlock feature. Each of my kids has a code and I never have to come home to them sitting on the porch because the left there key somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Solid, secure, and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in under an hour and I could not be more pleased. Very secure deadbolt, the screws are almost 4 inches long in the latch plate. The alarm feature is fantastic and loud and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Secure and easy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lock and super easy to install. We had the same issue many others were having with the schlage app and setting up the z wave technology. After speaking with the manufacturer i was able to connect it using our alarm system app. Quick, easy user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Eloy V.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works good. Sometimes sticks when using keyless because only is very slightly off center
customer_reviews.author: CL52662

customer_reviews.title: Best door lock ever
customer_reviews.text: Hard to understate how cool this lock is. I had the older model Schlage code lock, upgraded for this beauty. It fits the door better, it looks better, it performs better. The 'auto lock' feature is a major convenience. Connecting it to the wink hub, so I can control the lock with my phone was dead simple. This lock is expensive, but worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Leviosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and useful
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Wink system! Only had to replace batteries once in the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Self

customer_reviews.title: Great, Attractive door lock
customer_reviews.text: This handle is attractive and very functional. Now, my whole family can get in without a key. It took only about 20 minutes to swap out the old set that had broken.
customer_reviews.author: Randall J. Craddock

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! At times I wish I had a lock button inside as well - which would come in handy when you have your hands full and need to quickly lock the door behind you. I have this linked to a Smartthings hub and it works flawlessly. I've had this since the end of July, and the batteries are still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and functional lock. Works great with my ADT security system and with pulse automation. Can lock and unlock from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Darus

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Pay close attention to the instructions to make sure everything is oriented correctly before moving on. Beautiful well crafted handle. Batteries require annual replacement per the manual.
customer_reviews.author: JustSomeShark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well with wink hub. Took forever to set up but still doesn’t have all the features that the previous model did
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. Scales

customer_reviews.title: Best smart lock!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smart lock on the market. After using one for my home, ordered another for my parents. They are happy
customer_reviews.author: alexpilny

customer_reviews.title: ... new door lock and this door lock is very good quality, I love the way I can use ...
customer_reviews.text: I replace my front door so I ordered a new door lock and this door lock is very good quality, I love the way I can use this door lock with my smart things Hub... you can lock and unlock your door from your phone and also set an alarm great features anyone in the market to look for great door lock she consider buying this
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: It looks good
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use the Z connect feature. Either I didn't understand how to correctly set it up or it is a poorly implement addition.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Greene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this door handle! It’s pretty and was a great price. Didn’t love that I had to buy a hub to use it to lock and unlock from anywhere but it was worth it to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Penland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyless lock
customer_reviews.text: Just installed and I love it. Easy to program with simple instructions to program your own code. Love it will try to update.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Friesenhahn

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had more doors!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing find!!!! I’ll trust Schlage 100% Security and beauty what can be better than that! Love ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mighty PO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock, but check application compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with Schlage Sense app. Don't get this if you already have a Schlage sense lock, or want to use their app. Other than that, it's an excellent lock, just check and see if it supports the application that you want to use to connect to the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great door lock
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 4 months now and I couldn't be happier with it. It was easy to install and the instructions for setting up the codes were very simple as well. The only complaint I have (which really doesn't bother me at all) is that it's a bit noisy when you unlock with the keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Sheheartsprime

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with our ADT system. Was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with our ADT system. Was very upset since it matches our new door. 😕 Unable to get it to sync with the app either.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is a pleasure to use. Z-wave control world well. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Net

customer_reviews.title: we love it. makes securing your house so much easier
customer_reviews.text: we love it. makes securing your house so much easier. Go out in the yard and the door locks and we don't need keys to unlock.. Lighted key pad and very easy to press the code numbers at night.. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a smart home device to lock when I drive away and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a smart home device to lock when I drive away and give the kids a way to get in without a key. The look is great, and it locks smoothly. My gripe is not with the product but with the execution. I set the IFTTT app to lock the door when I'm away; whenever my phone loses any contact with a GPS satellite, my door locks. Not what I wanted, but it works. The kids are able to get their individual keys to get in. The product works as designed, but my plans for it fell a little short. I can't knock it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Had a bit of a blip with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had a bit of a blip with installation that wasn't explained in the manual and a 3 min call to the Schlage Cus Sup and it was resolved. Love that I don't have to worry about kids locking the door or getting locked out. Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whisamore

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and easy programming. Looks good and works with my 2 GIG security ststem
customer_reviews.author: Bretton

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Have been using for over a month and works great. Love he automatic locking mechanism and the fact you can have multiple codes.
customer_reviews.author: j Gib

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Great looks .
customer_reviews.text: Works great no installation problems at all . Happy with product .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stopped connecting
customer_reviews.text: Programming code stopped working after a year. Can’t connect to app
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to regular locks!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lockset! Installation was fairly smooth and it works very well. Love not having to keep up with extra keys!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey B Webb

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The lock works and looks great. I really like the auto-lock feature. It was easy to install and setup.
customer_reviews.author: John R Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great lock. Needs some features to make it perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lock for a couple months and I really like it except 1 feature. I can't get it to stay unlocked... Or even change the amount of time it stays unlocked. 30 seconds is not enough time. Has anyone found a way to change this?
customer_reviews.author: landon hickenbotham

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Unfortunately, it does not work because of my pre-cut door holes. But, return shipment was a smooth and easy process and my money was refunded promptly. Just because it didn't work for me, doesn't mean it isn't a great product in its own right.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Edgerton

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to install it. It wasn't as straight forward as I wished. Not because of the Schlage lock, but because of my previous setup. I had to make some holes in the door bigger, more adjustments on the door frame, etc. But it was a nice experience and got more self-confidence for small changes. Very happy with the way this lock looks and works. Feels extremely solid and safe. Now I need to get used to not carry keys.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with this product. It was really easy to install which is a plus. This is a great fit if you prefer a touch pad where the numbers are flush to the metal vs. the buttons that you push in.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: I chose to have this professionally installed through Amazon. Great product and great installation - very professional and fast. Schlage makes a quality product - you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered not what is described
customer_reviews.text: I actually cannot review the product itself as I’ve ordered it twice only to have just the handle delivered and not the deadbolt and keypad. Super frustrating as I’ve had to reschedule amazon installation service and return this item twice.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how we ever managed without this. No need to look for your key and stand there struggling with your packages. We have them on all of our outside doors now. So convenient and easy.
customer_reviews.author: JAG51

customer_reviews.title: Well worth a good look. Works with Wink. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Works with Wink. Open close at will. Easy install. Works smoothly. Looks great. Buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Catp.E.O

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and was actually new.
customer_reviews.text: perfect product that arrived on time and is actually new. Not some open-box crap that FBA people seem to like to push out.
customer_reviews.author: DarkChuuter

customer_reviews.title: I have been amazed at how well this works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this now for about a month. I considered numerous other locks, but decided on this one because I use Wink for my home automation. I have been amazed at how well this works. When ordering I was nervous that the bolt would catch on the edge of the door frame, however it is slightly tapered so it locks with ease. Very impressed. Love this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

product_meta.title: Schlage Z-Wave Connect Camelot Touchscreen Deadbolt with Built-In Alarm, Works with Amazon Alexa via Wink, Aged Bronze, FE469NX ACC 716 CAM LH
product_meta.description:
At Schlage, we know security. After all, we’ve been innovating locks for more than 90 years. Now, with the Touchscreen Deadbolt, we’ve created a door lock that combines all of our best security features into one lock—redefining what it means to be secure. With our innovative touchscreen feature, you have the convenience of going keyless and no longer having keys to lose, hide, carry or forget. The fingerprint-resistant touchscreen ensures numbers won’t be detectable to intruders after repeated use—safeguarding your home even more.

The Schlage BE469NX is BHMA/ANSI Grade 1 certified, the highest residential rating. Built from high quality materials, this keyless deadbolt gives you the highest level of security at the main point of entry. Additionally, the Schlage BE469NX door lock comes with a built-in audible alarm sensor that alerts you to activity at the door. You can select between 3 alert modes, activity, tamper, or forced entry, providing alerts from first contact with door or handle to when the door is opened. Quickly and easily cycle between the three settings simply by pressing a button on the lock. 

The Schlage BE469NX includes a touchscreen deadbolt with one back-up key, four AA batteries, and user guide and installation instructions.. If you plan to use this product with Z-wave systems other than Nexia Home Intelligence, please contact your Z-Wave provider to verify compatibility. 

The Schlage BE469NX is backed by a Lifetime Limited mechanical and finish warranty and 1-year electronics warranty.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
At Schlage, we know security. After all, we’ve been innovating locks for more than 90 years. Now, with the Touchscreen Deadbolt, we’ve created a door lock that combines all of our best security features into one keyless door lock, redefining what it means to be secure. Our innovative touchscreen feature provides the convenience of going keyless. No more keys to lose, hide, carry or forget. The fingerprint-resistant touchscreen ensures numbers won’t be detectable to intruders after repeated use, safeguarding your home even more. Schlage's Touchscreen Deadbolt with Alarm combines our best security features into one door lock: Grade 1 certification, an Anti-pick shield, Built-in Alarm technology. The Touchscreen Deadbolt is also enabled to work with Nexia Home Intelligence, a home automation system that allows you to control locks, thermostats, lights, cameras and more from wherever you and the Internet happen to be.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (hub required, Alexa device and hub sold separately). Exterior Dimensions: 3 x 5 x 1 inches,Interior Dimensions: 3 x 8 x 2 inches
Z wave technology connects to your home automation system and lets you lock or unlock your door remotely via the web or smartphone
3 Alert modes (activity, tamper and forced entry) let you know when someone is coming or going and communicate potential security threats
Ansi Grade 1 delivered the highest level of Durability and security at the main points of entry
Fingerprint resistant touchscreen protects against fingerprints and smudges and ensures wear patterns remain undetectable.Door thickness range(inches): 1 3/8 to 1 3/4 thick

Adjustable through bolt on handlesets can move up and down 1 1/2 inches to fit a variety of pre existing holes;Backset: Universal latches and deadbolts fit 2 /8 inches (60 millimeters) or 2 3/4 inches(70 millimeters) backsets
Easily control who has the access to your home. Memory for up to 30 different access codes means everyone can have their own Number, from the kids to the pet sitter and housekeeper
Durable Resistive Touchscreen with matte finish to protect against fingerprints and smudges
